page.title: 05Rockbeare Quarry
page.content: Rockbeare quarry is on Rockbeare Hill. Some of us went to see it.First I will tell you what Mr.West told us.We saw a photograph of the quarry.It was a lot bigger than the school.It was like looking at King Kong compared to an ant.112 people worked in the quarry in 1985.They produce 2000 tons of bricks,gravel,tar,stones & cement a day.The quarry is robbed 3to4 times a year.They have quite a few acidents every year.The worst was when a man thought a conveyor belt was frozen but it was not.He reached up to free it and his hand went in to a roller and took the tops of his fingers off. In the old days before they had machines they used to do something called napping.This was when you got a stone hit it with a hammer to split
